title: Minecraft适配于Oculus Rift的Win 10版本今天发布了（长文章）
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2016-8-26 17:38 编辑 

首先来一段视频：
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTY4NzA1NTY3Ng==.html无字幕版原视频地址：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j-Nfe5fc-xU
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTY4NzE0MTExMg==.html有字幕版（推荐）
原视频地址：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4N931e5tois

Minecraft VR版于今日进入了Oculus Rift的领域！
由Marsh Davies在2016年8月15日发布

你是否已经准备好在Minecraft里用VR眼镜来玩？（我把3句一起翻译了）现在可以了：今天我们发布了Minecraft：Win 10Beta版的一个免费更新，你能够用Oculus Rift来玩Minecraft了。Win 10的玩家们只需要从Oculus商店里下载定制的客户端来得到有立体感的体验！

回到4月，我们曾经为Gear VR发布了Minecraft VR专用版。这是用我们许多个月的努力工作凝结而成的产品，重塑你知道的游戏，并学会精确适应这个新的虚拟现实介质。（这句话怎样翻译更好？）在这样的成就后，你也许会认为我们会安慰处于困难中的VR团队还给他们放假，其实不然，我们还会说我们发现了一直超梦（口袋妖怪【滑稽】）并悄悄地堵在门口来骗他们回到Coding Pits继续工作。自从那以后，in exchange for scraps of old meat dropped from an overhead grill，我们的英雄团队一直在不停的工作来进一步调整和改善体验，使Oculus Rift的特性设置使人更加深刻。

干得漂亮，VR团队！给你们每一个人Double gristle rations（怎么翻译？）顺便说一下，Owen告诉我他在Quality Assurance Gulag里发现了一只Porygon（又是口袋妖怪【滑稽】）。

那么，这些新特性到底是什么呢？
       ·  支持原生键盘和鼠标！
       ·  在Xbox One设置中拟真又舒适的VR控制设置！
       ·  花哨的显示效果，就像MSAA清晰的视觉效果，新的渲染距离设置将会使用强大的VR显卡和最佳的Windows 10 DX11表现！
       ·  甚至更多细致的VR设置的定制，所以你将能享受到个性化的舒适！（？）

当然，这也只是一些主要的我们已经开发出了的VR具体特性。我们有一个虚拟客厅，允许你停止完全身临其境的体验并坐在一个虚拟的扶手椅上 - 一种减少VR的强度而又不破坏你的玩乐的好方法。我们也会各种各样地来调整你的移动，有些非常隐蔽，有些又很惊人 - 就像一种特别的旋转模式which breaks up the smooth rotation of your camera into abrupt jumps（好晕啊！又不会翻译）。这在视频中看起来很奇怪，但极大提高了你在游戏中的体验。

还有更多的信息在里面加载。你可以在我们的专用VR页面了解更多，或者观看上面植入的视频，看看VR的英雄Saxs和Tommo（Tomcc）解释他们怎样做了一些反直觉的发现！

所以，让你的眼睛准备好吧！

拜拜！

Marsh - @marshdavies

原文（修正翻译用）：

MINECRAFT VR COMING TO OCULUS RIFT TODAY!Posted on Aug 15, 2016 by Marsh Davies
How’s your face? Is it ready? Is it ready to have Minecraft right up in it? It’d better be: today we’re releasing a FREE update to Minecraft: Windows 10 Edition Beta which will enable you to play Minecraft on Oculus Rift. Win 10 players just need to download the bespoke launcher from the Oculus store to get the full stereoscopic experience!Back in April, we released Minecraft VR edition for Gear VR. It was the product of many, many months of hard work, reshaping the game you know and love to precisely fit the new medium of virtual reality. After such an achievement, you’d think we’d pat our beleaguered VR team on the back and send them on holiday, but, instead, we tricked them back into the Coding Pits by saying we’d spotted a Mewtwo in there and quietly barring the door. Since then, in exchange for scraps of old meat dropped from an overhead grill, our heroic team have worked relentlessly to further tweak and refine the experience, making our Oculus Rift feature-set even more impressive.Well done, team! Double gristle rations for everyone! By the way, Owen tells me he spotted a Porygon in the Quality Assurance Gulag.Anyway, what are these new features?Innate keyboard and mouse support!VR control options for immersive comfortable turning with the Xbox One controller!Fancy-pants graphics stuff, like MSAA for crisp visuals, new render distance settings that will make use of powerful VR graphics cards, and optimized Windows 10 DX11 performance!Even more granular customisation of VR settings, so you can mix-n-match for personalised comfort!
Of course, this is on top of the major VR-specific features we had already developed. We have a Virtual Livingroom, allowing you step back from the fully-immersive experience and into a virtual armchair - a great way to minimise the intensity of VR without breaking play. We’ve also made all kinds of tweaks to the way you move, some super subtle, some striking - like a special turning mode which breaks up the smooth rotation of your camera into abrupt jumps. It looks strange in videos, but it huuuugely improves the experience in-game.There are loads more besides. You can read more on our dedicated VR page, or watch the video embedded above in which VR heroes Saxs and Tommo explain how we came to make some of these counter-intuitive discoveries!So, get your peepers prepped!Cheerio!Marsh - @marshdavies
